name: Upteam Corporation Limited
description: Operator of an online curated platform intended to sell luxury vintage goods. The company's platform offers a collection of certified pre-owned, vintage and collectible merchandise including handbags, apparel, watches, spectacles, jewelry and accessories, of renowned brands, enabling customers to buy high-end luxury vintage goods at an affordable price.
one_liner: Operator of an online curated platform intended to sell luxury vintage goods.
